block.p: Antiterror Plan for Pakistan After months of criticism from Washington, Pakistan outlined a plan to curb the militant Islamic networks that have taken root at home and in Afghanistan. PAGE A6
Antiterror Plan for Pakistan After months of criticism from Washington, Pakistan outlined a plan to curb the militant Islamic networks that have taken root at home and in Afghanistan. PAGE A6
Lakers Take Command Shaquille O'Neal scored 40 points to lead Los Angeles to a 111-104 victory over the Indiana Pacers and a 2-0 lead in the N.B.A. finals. PAGE D1
King Conspiracy Discounted The Justice Department said it has found no evidence of a conspiracy in the assassination of the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. PAGE A8
